## Connection.disconnectInternal() method

Disconnect two blocks that are connected by this connection.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected disconnectInternal(setParent?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

setParent


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether to set the parent of the disconnected block or not, defaults to true. If you do not set the parent, ensure that a subsequent action does, otherwise the view and model will be out of sync.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
